snippet: A study from San Diego State University says women accounted for less than a third of all speaking roles in the year’s top-grossing domestic films.
abstract: A study from San Diego State University says women accounted for less than a third of all speaking roles in the year’s top-grossing domestic films.

headline.main: Only 15 Percent of Top Films in 2013 Put Women in Lead Roles, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Women Still Appear Less in Movies, Study Shows
